title: Mars Transit in the 8th House for Scorpio Ascendant
summary: When Mars transits the 8th house for Scorpio Ascendant, energy turns intense, inward, and transformative. This phase activates themes of sudden change, hidden matters, shared resources, and psychological depth. Emotional volatility and impatience can surface when control feels threatened. Risks related to joint finances, power struggles, or impulsive reactions may arise. When handled consciously, this transit supports fearless confrontation of fears, decisive problem-solving in crises, and deep inner transformation through disciplined action.

sections.title: Transformation & Crisis
points: Strong urge to confront hidden issues

sections.title: Shared Resources
points: Power struggles over control or dependency

closing: This Mars transit pushes Scorpio Ascendants into deep transformation. Mastery comes from controlling inner fire, not fighting shadows.
